archaeological_extraction.core_method: Extract and structure existing intelligence, never generate or summarize. Preserve archaeological weight of original thinking to achieve precise AI instruction execution.
implementation: Light and nimble processing, never overwhelming
Preserve archaeological weight of original thinking
When in doubt about preservation vs. clarity, always choose preservation
Structure what exists, don't create what doesn't
AI precision serves human preservation and enables meaningful task completion
